github_repository_webhook.description: Creates and manages repository webhooks within GitHub organizations

events.description: A list of events which should trigger the webhook. See a list of [available events](https://developer.github.com/v3/activity/events/types/).

configuration.description: key/value pair of configuration for this webhook. Available keys are `url`, `content_type`, `secret` and `insecure_ssl`. `secret` is [the shared secret, see API documentation](https://developer.github.com/v3/repos/hooks/#create-a-hook).

active.description: Indicate of the webhook should receive events. Defaults to `true`.

name.description: The type of the webhook. `web` is the default and the only option.
